line.comment: * $hasSkill = [THIS]-> get local variable: name='hasSkill'
* [THIS]-> set fire missile time difference to 8000 ms
* begining of main loop
* script will terminate if first command does not match 2nd command
* Advanced Missile Select
* do not fight if not both in same sector
* missile defence- this will interrupt an avoid collison action, which will cause
* the main script to restart, thus rechecking for missiles
* this allows for better missile detection and detroy
* this better helps the script determine when a ship is not fireing its lasers as
* an avoid collison action can sometimes prevent the script from determing this
* These lines will sometimes interrupt a skilled ship durring its Avoid Collision
* This will cause the ship to stop Avoiding and turn to attack much quicker
* This makes the AI seem more aggressive
* Ready fire missles according to needs...........................................
* This checks to see if victim is doing nothing, or Avoiding Collision,
* or is perhaps piloted by the Player
* sets up missile fire probability
* This stunt will cause missiles to be fired when victim has its back turned
* playing time is used here to prevent multiple missiles being fired at once
* resets interrupt handling if it was disabled

sval.val: advanced fighter combat tactics
no fire
no fire
no fire
no fire
no fire
the victim
Missile Skill
$hasSkill = [THIS]-> get local variable: name='hasSkill'
[THIS]-> set fire missile time difference to 8000 ms
begining of main loop
script will terminate if first command does not match 2nd command
Advanced Missile Select
do not fight if not both in same sector
missile defence- this will interrupt an avoid collison action, which will cause
the main script to restart, thus rechecking for missiles
this allows for better missile detection and detroy
this better helps the script determine when a ship is not fireing its lasers as
an avoid collison action can sometimes prevent the script from determing this
These lines will sometimes interrupt a skilled ship durring its Avoid Collision
This will cause the ship to stop Avoiding and turn to attack much quicker
This makes the AI seem more aggressive
Ready fire missles according to needs...........................................
This checks to see if victim is doing nothing, or Avoiding Collision,
or is perhaps piloted by the Player
sets up missile fire probability
This stunt will cause missiles to be fired when victim has its back turned
playing time is used here to prevent multiple missiles being fired at once
resets interrupt handling if it was disabled
